content.detailedDescription: I was at my grandmothers house watching tv with my grandmother brother and wife and new born daughter.   the show we were watching on tv, (before cable, just a tv antenna) the tv went to grey snow.  my brother went out to see the stars.  he came running in to say a ufo was outside.  i came out and saw the ufo.  i stared at it.  i was in the usaf and i thought it might be some new type of quiet helicopter.  four of them.  three making a triangle and one in the middle.  the ufo was making a small hissing noise.  i was too scared to go take a photo.  i went back into the house to tell my wife what i saw.   the tv went back on and i went outside and didn't see the ufo anymore. i haven't  told many people about what i said because they would think i was joking or crazy.  there is not very many days i don't think about this night.   things would be different now.  i am constantly looking in sky for another view.  my friend also saw a triangle shadow in the night sky.  it covered the stars.   that is why i am reporting.  i know this is the truth.
content.summary: Brother ran in house to say a ufo outside.  i went to see

content.detailedDescription: When i was a kid, i was laying in my bed and something awoke me from my sleep. there was a bright light outside my window that was pulsating, i looked outside and can remember a bright light. than i felt like i was instantly was apart from myself. i dont remember much of the event but i do remember being on a table, and feeling as tho i was going fast through the universe, feeling as thought there was like no time there in relation to earth. than, the next thing i remember is being back in my bed frozen and couldnt move, and very scared. the years that followed i was scared to sleep, and having severe documented migraines for years. the doctors did an mri on me and found out i had something that had to be removed in my head. since the surgery about 3 years after the incident, i havn't had migraines. i do believe this incident sparked this issue.
content.summary: My abduction story

content.detailedDescription: Not sire what we saw but t was like ufp
content.summary: Not sire what we saw but t was like ufp

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my father in caguas p.R. for about one month. when i was observing numerous flying ojects they would land in what is call the 3mountains. the first mountain people lived there,in the second mountain there were scatter people residing there,however the third mountain no one lived there.No evidance of lights were ever seen there.My brother and i would stay up all night observing different kinds of flying object hovering in a v formation and then scatter as they landed. no landing strip to acommadate these craft and imagine the tallest mountain in p.R. where no one lived there and ther where no lights. the only thing there was wild life which engulf the whole mountain. yet we observed these light land and then move around in the ground really werid. one night all this came to a reality, we were inside the complex, each one in ther own rooms when we hear screaching and screaming as if someone was about to died. this is what my family of 5 and myself heard in spanish "the world is ending oh my god!" as we all ran to the terrace we observe them running from something. there were countless people some fell yet i notice they were all looking up. that's when i was sticken to amazement. yes it was a ufo it was a dics shape craft with a end that look like a point. there was no noise it didnt waver from side to side it was perfectly still it was observing us. it wa so close to us i thought it may land at any moment.This object was like mercury substance there was no divison or bolts it appeared to be like mercury, perfectly molded. it moved fom one point to another in a speed like nothing we have ever seen. if any man flying any craft knowen to man would do this his eyes would come out of his socket,gravity would not permit this. it's impossible!.I climed on a ledge of a bannerster inorder not to remove my eyes from it, not realizing i was standing on a ledge of a six story building, only holding to a corner of the wall then i pointed at my chest and then pointed to the craft reaptily. what i was indicting was take me with you,what was i thinking...Lol. all i did was gazed at the ufo, as it went staight and directly up with no noise it continued to asended with rapid speed until it became a dot in the sky and then disappeared until no evidence of it was seen. there is a hospital called regional hospital there must be about 3,000 employees that work there, well most of them witness this event shortly before and after they came out to observe this ufo. that evening the news spoke on this event. the army was there searching after the fact.As long as i live i will never forget this incident.You dont have to believe it however i know and the countless witness that saw this event  can validate this.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over6story buiding,300 people witness it,newspapers wrote on it,army were in the skys, numerous were questioned, it was day,hospital employees witness it as well they were on the windows then came 2the streets

content.detailedDescription: Since it was moving away from me as it past it looked like a flat triangle if you ask me i say it was a black hole triangle
content.summary: Just silent and slow moving

content.detailedDescription: On saturday may10,2014 at 147am,exactly, i parked my  truck facing west as always,there are no streetlights in front of my house, then i looked up in time to see a meteor flash up overhead through the tree top and seconds later a very large bright deep-orange orb/circle of light came into view from the west going east/northeast i grabbed my 7x binocs got out walked into the road to getaclear view and watched it clearly overhead. it had the altitude of a small airplane but it was only a large circle of orange light headed east, then straight up before it left my view so i looked at the time on my phone 147am. it looked exactly the same coming towards me, overhead, and leaving. 60seconds max. i have never seen a light like this before ever. twas a truley amazing sight! no photo taken.
content.summary: I parked my truck facing west 147am looked out my driver window saw a very bright deep orange color orb/circle flying towards me, grabbed7xbinocs watched itgoeastthenstraightupandgone

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front porch talking with a friend on a cordless phone.  i was looking up at a southbound jet approximately 80 degrees above the horizon which was flying at about 5000 ft. on it's approach to either boeing field or seatac airport. before i took my gaze away my eye caught movement of what i, at first, thought was a satellite. it was blue and larger than a satellite, and much larger than surrounding stars. i would say it was slightly larger than the iss looks when it traverses overhead, but not standing out in brightness from the surrounding stars. its movement and distinct blue color, plus the 'this is way different factor' had me instantly. its heading was northerly, about 12 to 15 degrees west of due north. i was facing east, and at the beginning of the sighting it was right at the crossing point from south into north.  the object had no flashing or pulsating lights like a plane, and while blue, its' appearance was slightly ovoid.
when i saw it, i exclaimed to my friend on the phone, "omg! i think i'm seeing a ufo! wow!" right when i said this, it brightened to white, and as if it had heard me, the white light seemed to roll around and point directly down at me, like a spotlight, becoming intensely bright for about one second. then, it returned to the still bright, but dimmer white, then back to the blue it started as, continuing in the northerly direction.  all this while, i am narrating what i was seeing to my caller, starting to tell him i was going out to my driveway to catch it coming from behind the treetop it had just went behind, when my phone startled me by going beep! beep! beep! beep! and died! i nearly fell over things trying to keep focused on the expected trajectory of the object as i went to my driveway, but the object seemed to have disappeared. i stood and searched the sky carefully, but it was not where it should have been, nor was it anywhere to be seen. i went inside to put my phone on the charger and to call back my friend on my cellphone, when my dead phone rang!  it was my friend commenting that we had gotten disconnected.  i checked the battery level on the cordless, which had moments before read deader than a doorknob, to find that it was now showing a perfectly good charge. previous experience said this should not be. i have no explanation for why it died during this sighting, and magically revived without recharging. also, i have a comparison for what i saw- it was very similar to footage i had seen of ufo's at gilliland ranch.
content.summary: Blue sattelite-like object suddenly flashes brilliant white for 1 sec then back to blue

content.detailedDescription: Daytime 4:30 pm approx.  stepped out of backdoor of house,it was a nice day to be outside, enjoying the view looking upward to east hillside ,sky,it was holding in the air not to high up over the horse pastures. quickly into house,called other person to come look at this' 'we're both outside looking at sort of dull color burnt-umber~metal? first thought from me was ,thought it was the basket of a hot-balloon 'without the hot-air balloon top,it looked squarish at higher alt. though as it descended lower the shape obvious not square was rectangular with curved-sides with one window. curved window slight angle . it was in east sunny light from west, descent continued 'not to ground  .Object (not like a hover motion) holding very steady in air of sky, it turned slightly yet holding in sky' one could look into window into the interior of object ,no sun glint on window absolutely ,no reflected light on window at this moment , two beings are in the interior ,they did not seem to know  two humans were looking , as the object [pod~ pop can shaped~ ] sightly turned ,one of the grays looked our way, the grays arm motioned with movement to the other gray, the other gray briefly glanced our way .  i said to other person "they're looking at us" ,quickly got into house ,for camera ,for  as the gray motioned it's arm to the other  gray,the vessel-pod-object-yes ufo ', was ascending  very steadily upward to higher alt. where it started to change . not physically but energy field ~ first whitish , then 3 horizontal color bands. all within pinch of time ,transitional phase ~?Perhaps vessel has to get higher up ,air density or air temp colder~ . away 3 bands of color and invisible to human eye .   the fiji 5x  did catch something ,looks roundish ,small for it is high up in sky .   some one helped put it on dvd ,still trying to figure out this computer.  the other person it is up to them ,person did briefly talk about the shape/forms =under part - base of object .  grey plane  june6 2010 not regular for the airport pre noon approx.  radar  if radar detects hot air ballons or just the basket part of hot air balloon, then it is possible.  ps. i had my disclosure' having eyes looking back at one another ,from another species ,it is rough ,prefer the well known species .
content.summary: 06/05/2010 4:45 pm daytime  rectangled-box with curved sides  in sky over horses in pasture

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my boyfriends house on april 26th 2014 around 10pm. i first noticed bright red and white lights flashing in the sky spread apart. i then saw a large  triangle shaped craft right above my car. it was hovering so low it was about the height of the houses on the street. the craft had bright white lights coming from it. it had no sound.  i immediately grabbed my phone to take pictures of it. the craft then became to move so quickly in different directions that didn't seem possible. i was so terrified. it felt as i was having a outer body experience.  the object began  to move faster away from my car. i began to follow it and i all of a sudden lost view of it like it disappeared. i have been deeply interested in aliens for the past 6 months. ever since this encounter i have been having terrifying dreams of aliens and ufos that i can't even explain. i am 100%. sure that this was not a object from our world.
content.summary: Dark black soundless triangle shaped craft with bright white and red lights flashing repeatedly. it moved very fast in quick directions. the lights lit up showing a outline of a huge craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the house sleeping on 11 may 2014 around 0652 in the morning. my wife noticed that things were missing or moved in the house. my phone was found in the basement in my care ( it was in the kitchen when i went to sleep) my dogs name tag was broke off his collar and it was found on the kitchen table like someone set it there.

this is the second time this week that the aliens were caught on video at my house.  i know they will be back! but why??

my cameras should of activated earlier if someone was walking up to the front yard. as you can see there was no warning. just a face looking into the camera.  please help me in this matter.
content.summary: This is an alien looking into my outside survalience camera on my front deck. the other video shows it removing my camera.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two of my friends where out in perris after dark shooting guns near lake perris. we started to pack things up and noticed an very bright red/orange light hovering high above us near a the top of a hill by us. we started talking and came to the conclusion it was mars. then i started to noticed it was moving almost swaying like a helicopter would if it was flying still. one of my friends also noticed the weird movement. at one point it almost seemed like it split into two then went back to one large light. we were very spooked because we were in the middle of nowhere and had no cellphone reception. the object would sit still for a while then i would notice it sway and move from right to left and then back into place. there was a lot of us going back in forth with each other about what it was. me and one friend thought it was a ufo the other fiend was not convinced it was anything. as we started to leave i noticed a bunch of bi antennas to our right. i later google mapped what they were and discovered it was a company called teleport la and called them asking what they did. the man over the phone explained they receive transmissions from satellites and transfer the transmission to radio/tv/etc. seeing these huge antennas started to freak me out so i loaded a clip for my rifle just in case something was about to happen. as i finished and we got into the car to leave. my cellphone died. we drove off as fast as we could down a small dark dirt road before we even got 200 feet away my friend in the back seat yelled " dude it's gone ". i thought he was lying so i stopped and we all got out to check. the bright light was gone.  we sped off and got out of there as fast as we could. when we got on the road i saw march air force base was right off the freeway. very odd. also when i turned my phone back on the time said 4:30pm this was at 7:33 at night and i know my phone had the correct time before it shut off. this was a very cool experience in my opinion and really hope to experience it again. regardless if it was a drone or military aircraft we still did see a ufo.
content.summary: Saw object hovering above us. seemed like it was stationary then it would have random moments of movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my way to the mall walking at my neighborhood 
suddenly i noticed a glowing object flying in the sky near the moon, 
i thought it was strange and unlike anything known so i took out the cell phone and started filming the object 
the object moving at a uniform and flickered, went up and down and after about half a minute disappeared from view 
i felt passionate and shocked to photograph the event because i felt something unusual happens..........
content.summary: Flying object

content.detailedDescription:
Driving with my cousin going to a birthday party kinda late 
for the party driving down a dirt road nothing around all of a sudden
bright light appears in front of the car 15 or 20 feet my best guess 
only got to look at it for a split second then it made a left-hand turn it was 
so fast i can't explain the speed when i saw it move i turned my neck so fast
all is that i can say is that i saw a very fast flying ufo till that day i've been interested
in ufos till present day
content.summary: Driving saw light appear front of car

content.detailedDescription: Hello, last night about 10:15 pm, i witnessed and orange/red fireball, very high in the atmosphere traveling from east to west in the northern sky over chicago. the object came into view to my right (east) and traveled the entire span of the sky at a high rate of speed fading to my left (west). the entire sighting lasted a couple of minutes. i have seen many meteors enter the atmosphere and this was entirely different. it glowed/flashed red/orange and appeared to be burning.
content.summary: Orange/red fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were talking outside for about 10 minutes when i said look at that up in the sky what i thought i was seeing was the iss or sattalite 
except its brightness was irregular compared to most moving lights i have seen. i watched as it crossed from west to east above the clouds  but unlike a plane or sattalite it never dropped below the horizon instead it stayed a course straight into space judging by the angle it approached and left. i followed it for the entire duration and then some. as it left away from me it went from white to a dim glowing orange at its rear once it left sight about 20 seconds later there was two flashed of lights like lightning seen from a great distance within a minute there were two rumbles of thunder in sequence with the lightning flashes. my theory is they used the explosions to ride the shock waves in space. i am a person of reason i never experienced anything like this and prior to this i thought i seen a ufo but the sighting i am reporting today exhibited intelligence it was an unearthly object propelled into space the creations of man cannot complete such actions.
content.summary: Looked like a sattalite  but brighter didnt drop below horizon not an air craft or meterite displayed intelligent control

content.detailedDescription:
At about 2206 est, i was standing on the second floor deck on the back of my town home watching the stars when i spotted a large, pulsating multi-colored light to the west-south west, about 245 to 250 degrees by compass. from my vantage point, the light was stationary and appeared to be hovering just above tree-top level, west of i-270 toward point of rocks and harper's ferry. the light itself was about three or four times larger than a star, but smaller than the moon, and was circular or orb shaped; it was flashing what appeared to be red, blue, white and green-colored lights. i was likely too far distant to hear any sounds from the craft, even if it was emitting them. though i realized some of the flashing colors are similar to aircraft navigation lights, the strange, rapid, pulsating quality of the lights, combined with the apparent low altitude and size of the object led me to signal a nearby neighbor, who was fiddling on his phone below me on the street. we are not unaccustomed to state police helicopter landings and searches in our area; i also figured the light might be some firework or perhaps a transformer exploding. 
while trying to direct my neighbor around the corner of his town house block, so that he could observe what i was seeing, i tried turning on my camera, which i luckily still had in my back pocket. as i struggled to guide my neighbor to a good vantage point, since his ground-level view was still obstructed by some houses across the street, i finally was able to get my camera to turn on. i snapped a few photos, most of which didn't turn out well, and then captured a brief, albeit extremely shaky video on my phone(the craft did not move, only my hands.) throughout this period, the object seemed to remain stationary, hovering and flashing. after taking these photos, i continued to work on my neighbor who was still in the wrong position. as he finally began moving in the right direction to get a clear view of the object, the pulsating from the light faded and by the time my neighbor saw it, it had 'shrunk' down to a single white light. as it did, it began moving southward, parallel to i-270, it appeared, just above tree level. i subsequently ran down to street level, since my view was now blocked, joining my neighbor at the corner to watch the craft as it cruised off the south. 
after it disappeared from our view, we were joined shortly thereafter by  two other neighbors, who were disturbed by my shouting. another small white light flying the same flight path (north to south parallel to i-270), flew along the tops of the some distant trees at about the same speed as the other craft. there was no flashing, pulsating or abnormal size with this light, however, it seemed to be a regular aircraft.
i submitted a foia report to the faa, asking for radar data from the area at around that time. it may very well have been a plane or helicopter whose lights were distorted by the weather. i've seen a lot of aircraft, though nothing quite like that.
content.summary: Bright, hovering lights west of i-270

content.detailedDescription:
on the 27th of december 2013 at midnight, i saw something really strange!                                               

on that friday, two days after christmas, i was on the trampoline in my yard, and observing the stars. it had been a cool night and there were no clouds. my little brother who is seven decided to come out and join me.We were not out longer than five minutes or so when we saw the absolutely the strangest thing. 

 what happened was so fast that i can barely recall it sufficiently to what happened, but my little brother and i saw three unidentified flying objects (ufo) flying across the sky! disk shaped and slightly orange they slighted wobbled around as they moved across the sky. immediately i gasped in surprise, my brother and i stood straight up. 
over the next few days, i could not let it go. i had seen ufos, i was sure of it! therefore later i researched similar sightings. loads of people have seen what i had seen. on the web there were many pictures similar to what i had seen. this amazed me, making me surer that what i had seen was real. 

recap: they moved/ wobbled across the sky, slightly orange, bigger then the stars, lost sight as for they disappeared after about 15 seconds, and they were very distinctive.
content.summary: Saw three circular objects wobble across the sky, they were bigger then the stars and moved quite fast.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching _mysteries at the museum_ (s04, e01, "edison's electric pen") i happened to pause the show and noticed what appears to be something in the sky. it appears on one frame only. 

i don't 'own' the program, since i'm just a viewer. however, i'm attaching my screen captures.

i have no idea when it was filmed but your program required a date, so i inserted one.
content.summary: Accidentally captured on tv program

content.detailedDescription: I had an encounter with a huge orange glowing craft about the size of a large house. the last thing i remember was watching it drift slowly away to the southeeast and disappear behind a hill. i observed this craft in great detail through a pair of 10 by 50 binoculars. i watched this craft change colors and shape and observed all these lumpy features on it as it lit up in a brilliant orange just for a few seconds. when it started to descend over this hill near corte madera i saw in great detail all these lumpy features as i can only describe as looking like some kind of a turtle shell looking surface in a huge oval shape. before this the object appeared as a round ball with a cone on top and curved right and left sides almost like a teardrop and was transparent in the middle. it also had a triangular prism like appearance to it. other objects were also seen before and after this encounter with this giant orange craft. when i looked at my watch i noticed i had been standing in this same spot up on top of this mountain road for 2 hours and 15 minutes. there is a lot more to this story even though the huge orange craft was only seen for about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Encounter with huge glowing orange craft

content.detailedDescription: My friend natalie and i were walking through nantucket, we flew their with some friends, i am a pilot and we make trips like this every once in a while. while we were walking around we saw something on the horizon maybe 4.5 to 5.5 miles off of the shore. it was at about 1000 ft when i first saw it, i thought it was an airplane heading towards us- hence the left side being lighted green and the right side being lighted red with a white light on top of it. suddenly it took off up to somewhere around 7-8000 feet. it hovered there for a few seconds then it slowly lowered down to sea level and appeared to disappear. it appeared as though it entered the water, i thought about the other possibility being that it quickly flew over the horizon away from us but i find that much less likely. the object obviously appeared to be bending light around it and had a vibrating like appearance to it making it appear fuzzy. it made a very distinctive noise however not engine noise that you would expect from a manmade object- it was the sound of the air moving around the object almost like the sound of a large plane gliding without engines, i fly large rc airplanes that are electric and the sound that they make when they glide very fast is smiler to the sound that this object was giving off. the object was very easy to see and clearly identifiable if one were to look in the right direction. i told my friend natalie who was holding my ipad to record it. it was very easy to see in person, but on the video playback it is very hard to make out. i honestly feel as though it used some kind of technology that made it hard to record or see during playback. im a pilot and strange airplanes, fighter jets, flares, chaff and all of those things i am accustomed to seeing, however this was nothing like anything i've seen before as far as its behavior goes. if you would like, call me if you want the video, you can barely make out an object that is a bluish color and it appears to be faintly flashing. the video would need to be optimize if you'd want actual footage of the object it was recorded on an ipad. when the ipad tries to look up a little bit, that is when the objects ascends upward, don't mistake the light posts for it.
content.summary: Red/green ball of light making maneuvers straight up and down that are impossible by manmade objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young high school traveling in a school bus to a basketball game in the evening. i was with about 25 other kids and the driver and an adult youth group leader. we saw a ufo in the sky slowly moving in a straight path over the cedarbrook mall, across from what was then beaver college in glenside. i noticed the object because it was dark out and i was looking out the window and it had lights. i thought- that's no airplane. 
the object was very clear. it was well below the cloud cover, it had a top that was sort of a disk with a bottom attached like a "cup on a saucer" up side down. the bottom part was revolving slowly around, and had a row of medium sized lights on it that were revolving around. the lights were sort of amber in color, the whole object lit up a bit by them to a pale gold or copper color. the object proceeded in a straight path very slowly over a large shopping mall. it may have stopped and hovered, but i don't remember for sure. 
i felt certain i was looking at a ufo. i was excited and awed. i spoke to my friends on the bus about it, and they all looked and saw it, commenting how strange it was, then resumed socializing with each other. one or two other kids i didn't know well continued to watch it with me.We went on to the game. i lost sight of it when we went up the road. 
later i told my parents about it and made a sketch to show them. my father told me he'd seen a cigar shaped ufo as a child living in the country in the town of solebury, pa.
content.summary: Saw a ufo clearly in the sky over a large shopping center. others with me noted but had no interest.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my front yard smoking a cigarette observing the pre sunrise sky......Rubbing my eyes surprised where there was empty sky now appeared two spinning disc shaped fiery orbs .....Ok i'll be honest at first i thought two jet planes turned on the chem trails .....Observing the objects for more  than a minute my brains calculations report to me......Simon don't be a fucking idiot go grab that smartphone and utilize it's  doggone video camera because they were not leaving trails ....Those objects were obviously not jet planes ,weather balloons ,choppers ,comets ,meteors even though the last two choices are possibly possible ....But naw.....Any man made earth craft would of took way less time to  cross the sky zipping out of sight we all seen this before .....We all can agree unanimously that no plane hovers in the sky for that long moving that short of a distance in 12 minutes ....Unless there a  vast distance away from the planet say outside of earth's atmosphere apparently with the firey glow slowly shifting spinning fuel/energy from the suns corrona to the power supply of what i come to realize were not only vastly far...But vastly huge alien spacecrafts refueling there core reactors utilizing the invisible energies of the suns outer atmosphere rendering them very visible now ...Practicly alive .....Slightly changing shape on there slow treck through the minds eye......As the first 2 decend below a very important frame of reference (witch most footages of ufos fail to capture)this being my neibors roofline backing up constantly the shakiness of my hands trying to get as much footage as possible before the strange scenery can no longer be seen as i back up one more time you hear me say under my breath ( excuse my language ) what  the fuck .....Pointing the camera in the same direction two more larger or maybe slightly closer objects appear to be tracing the exact same flight path .....The video stops around 6 minutes but the remaining video that didn't  upload to my google drive were of the last 2 objects decending for six more minutes but it's only obvious that the six minutes that  did upload is gonna make a mark on mankind as 1000% real genuine footage of unidentified  flying/floating orbs/objects
content.summary: Very large very distant (i think out of earth's atmosphere )spinning wobbling gravity defying fiery orbs/spacecrafts harnessing fuel /energy from crossing the suns outer atmosphere

of earth's atmosphere apparently with the firey glow slowly shifting spinning fuel/energy from the suns corrona to the power supply of what i come to realize were not only vastly far...But vastly huge alien spacecrafts refueling there core reactors utilizing the invisible energies of the suns outer atmosphere rendering them very visible now ...Practicly alive .....Slightly changing shape on there slow treck through the minds eye......As the first 2 decend below a very important frame of reference (witch most footages of ufos fail to capture)this being my neibors roofline backing up constantly the shakiness of my hands trying to get as much footage as possible before the strange scenery can no longer be seen as i back up one more time you hear me say under my breath ( excuse my language ) wtf .....Pointing the camera in the same direction two more larger or maybe slightly closer objects appear to be tracing the exact same flight path .....The video stops around 6 minutes but the remaining video that didn't  upload to my google drive were of the last 2 objects decending for six more minutes but it's only obvious that the six minutes that  did upload is gonna make a mark on mankind as 1000% real genuine footage of unidentified  flying/floating orbs/objects
content.summary: Very large very distant (i think out of earth's atmosphere )spinning wobbling gravity defying fiery orbs/spacecrafts harnessing fuel /energy from crossing the suns outer atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out side of my garage looking into the sky when i noticed an extremely dark cloud under the light gray cloud cover. it was shaped like a snake and was segmented proportionally. it's head was shaped like marvin the martians craft (only description ii could think of). it's movement was that of a snake but in the sky. after it had left my sight i heard a sound far to the west that chilled me to the bone. it sounded like the jake brake of a semi truck but way louder and slower, getting lower in tone until i could only feel it. after this i looked above my neighbors house and saw 2 clouds hovering there (they seemed a distance of 50-75 feet at first) the one on the left was shaped like a generic dinosaur skeleton but with a singular horn on its head, and it was staring into the face of an alien shaped cloud that was staring right back. after i had started at them for a minute or so the alien shaped one started coming straight at me (this was when i realized the clouds were only 25 feet or so away)  i ran straight back into my garage and the cloud was maybe 7 feet away in my neighbors yard.  at first the clouds were carved as if someone had gone up there and had done it by hand.  seeingthe craftsmanship of it gave me goosebumps (expecially the prehistoric skeleton looking one how i could see through the spots where there was no bone). when the alien shaped cloud descended it got way smaller and lost its shape. after i had layed in bed i kept hearing movement in my house (too much to be the cats) and got strange sensations in random parts of my body. i have felt very paranoid since the incident.
content.summary: Snake like segmented object,  loud sounds then shaped clouds n one approached

content.detailedDescription: Was looking for objects in the sky noticed three flashing objects with various colors in the western sky we saw three orbs one due west one at west northwest and one at north northwest they were at different elevations but they were  flashing the same blue red green and had a white light on top that was stationary.
content.summary: Three flashing objects in the western sky we were outside looking for ufos and noticed that a star was twinkling with red in it with our naked i put on the binoculars and could tell it was flashing blue and red and green not only one object but three obje

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work. left my work place in versailles ky at 2:54 am. drove about 8 miles west on highway us 60 west to get to interstate 64 west. a quarter of a mile or so from the interstate, i noticed something that looked like a low flying plane. i looked at time on radio and it was 3:14 am. i have tinted windows on my car so i let my window down to get a better look at it. at that time i was close to the stoplight for the left turn to get on the interstate. the light turned red and i stopped. i notice the craft in the air stopped also. it really got my attention then. when the light turned green i proceeded left and drove up the ramp onto the interstate. a tractor trailer passed and i got in behind it. to my left on the other side of the interstate i notice the craft. it was keeping up with my car. the speed limit is 70 and the truck in front of me was doing about 60. i decided not to pass and stay back and see what this thing was.It went out of my view before i passed the kentucky river bridge. after the bridge there are rock walls on both sides going westbound. after clearing them the craft appeared at about 10 o'clock to my left. i let my window down to try and get a video of it. couldn't get it. i was about a quarter of a mile from my exit home and it started to bear to the left. i took the exit right and when i got to the end of the exit i stopped at the stop sign. the craft made a right turn and stopped too. i proceeded right in the left lane and the craft was on the other side of the road just above the utility poles. i needed to go about 1/3 of a mile to make a left turn to get home. it stayed with me. when i slowed down to get in the left turning lane the craft turned left. i made a quick turn right and raced up the street about a half mile maybe less to the super america store. i parked in front and the craft went over head and up in the sky. it took the appearance of a star. i went inside and got me something to drink and i told the cashier about something following me. she said it was probably the police. enough said to her. i went outside and looked up and it was still there. got in my car and proceeded to make a right turn on us 127 south. the craft went from being a star into being some type of ship. it was withing 30 yards from my passenger side window on the right. it hovered for maybe 10 seconds and slowly proceeded south up the street. i don't remember anything until i pull up at home to park my car. lost 20 minutes somewhere. the craft went to the western sky and took the appearance of a star again. i ran inside for a few minutes and then came back out to see if it was still there. it was and it looked like an orange star. i got my phone and got about 49 seconds of video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silver gray about 30 feet long with 5 panels and what appeared to be 4 windows

content.detailedDescription:
We are in remote location on a hillside at 5,000 altitude.  we routinely sky-watch from our hot tub and watch planes, satellites, the iss, shooting starts, etc.  
tonight my wife was looking out window at neighbors house (checking security as they were away). called me to the window as she noticed a bright object toward (but above) the horizon that looked weird.  
i saw the object and it was the only light object in the sky.  bright.  no stars or clouds visible (dusk).  very apparent twinkling effect that did not match anything we have ever observed.  
got a pair of binoculars. we turned out the house lights and stood in an open doorway for an unobstructed view.  the object was obviously hovering.  to us it was positioned adjacent to the edge of a branch on a pine tree and never moved from that position.
it had varying light colors showing.  the effect to both of us was that lights were rotating around the object yet appeared somewhat random in the color effect.  it displayed a strobe-like flash but of a much longer flash duration than strobes seen on an aircraft.  this is what gave it the twinkling effect (at a distance).  it was not similar to a strobe light bar because the flash duration was too long.
the lights tended to prevent us seeing any other portion of the craft but there appeared to be a shape above the lights, but not much larger than the circumference of the lights.
the impression i got was that it could have been a helicopter hovering and someone trying to make it look like a ufo by using some very bright and unique lighting technology.
duration was about 15 minutes.  as time went on it did get dimmer to the point that it was not longer visible.  as the object itself started to fade out the stars were beginning to be seen.  
important to note that it never moved.  even if it was going straight away from us we would have been able to tell over that 20 minute period.  it just stayed in the same spot almost touching that same tree branch.  if you have one more person who could position it just as exactly you could probably triangulate the approximate position and altitude.
from our position we often see the medical helicopter from the nearby hospital as it takes off and flies towards the valley (phoenix metro area).  we usually lose sight of it as it drops towards the horizon and below the mountains, thus blocking our view.
distance.  if it were to be the same size as the medical helicopters we watch than i would estimate the distance as 3 miles.  i had the impression that the distance was much further and that the craft was much larger than a medical helicopter.  distance as much as 20-45 miles.  if it were 45 miles it would be visible to residents of fountain hills and people at saguaro lake.  if so, then you will have other reporting the vent.
i started writing this at about 2010 while my wife gave me updated reports.  i listed to the radio scanner and it was quiet with no activity.
i would like to note that i have flown as a passenger in small fixed and rotary wing aircraft at night so i am also somewhat familiar with time/distance traveled as well as how aircraft appear at night, and at what distance they can be seen from.
good luck, hope this helps.

if you want to contact please make the initial one by email.  tnx!
content.summary: At dusk and only thing visible. twinkled with varying colors

content.detailedDescription: I was at my desk at work at 501 south cherry street when i look out my window towards the west and saw a black object emerging from the mountains between the foothills and the peaks.I first thought it was a helicopter but as the object grew larger i then thought it was an airplane. after about 1 minute i noticed the object was ascending straight up very fast then i noticed a small orb around the object when it began to go up the orb reflected downward and when the object flew downward as if falling out of the sky the orb would shift upward like something was propelling it or some sort of propulsion system. i felt as if my eyes were playing tricks on me or i was going crazy. i changed angles to verify it was not something on the window like a bug. after 10 minutes i verified it could not be a bird because of the straight up and straight down movement and maneuvers it was making. also because of the speed at which it was moving. determining the distance of the object and how quickly it came from behind the foothills. i told myself to grab my camera phone which is a 21 megapixel samsung galaxy 5 and zoomed as far as possible to focus on the object. at that time it began hovering as if it were not moving in thin air but sitting there. then it ascended at a point where it was over the mountain peak line within seconds. after the first video i took. i went to see if i could get a witness at work to verify what i was seeing. when i returned the object was over the treetops just floating. i also noticed the object flickering or pulsating. as i withdrew my camera phone to take more footage the object shot directly left (south) within the blink of a second. that's when i knew that this was not anything normal. you can see in the 2nd video that the object is far more south of its previous location and once again. elevating quickly and dropping quickly. i am on the 8th floor and the object was much larger then it appears on the camera maybe it was further then i thought or maybe the camera thru the window wasn't as effective. the object seems to be a black dot in the video but from eye sight it was as large as a penny at several miles away. after the 2nd video i watched for about 2-5 more minutes before the object lowered just above the treetops then shot upward disappearing. my memory was full at the time so i was unable to continue taping the object. i look out this window towards the mountains 5 days a week for the past 2 years and have never seen anything like it. about 15 minutes after the object disappeared a black helicopter went by the area in front of the mountains and headed north. several minutes later another went by in the same direction and flight path. they were nowhere near as fast as the object. i also saw a green (possibly news helicopter) fly by a few more minutes after the large black helicopters.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black object came out of mountains and began very strange flight patterns & hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
My 1st memorable experience seeing a ufo was when i was 3, maybe 4yrs old either shortly before or after my parents divorced and my father left so maybe, possibly i am delusional or crazy, i don't know. we lived in massilon, oh in projects on the corner of stuhldrier & wales rd in or right around 1978-1980. i have had multiple "strange, odd or different experiences a lot throughout my life which a lot i'm unable to explain or describe. my life has been from that point on & after very different which i simply just attributed or attribute as i got older to my father leaving or something and never spoke much if anything at all about it to anyone or at least a very few select people and i don't & can't remember who they'd be today. that 1st experience i remember is still very clear but somewhat faded. i watched it move or fly from the south > north, no memory of speed it was moving. it just came very fast from the n simply stopped over an apt building, house,  neighborhood, i don't know where. that said, please review my "short description". what made me first notice, never forget nor forgotten was the instant stopping and hovering over ???, than i remember my mom calling for me and i remember being sort of mesmerized and nothing after that moment besides the memory of wondering what the hell i seen.....My whole life. along with everything (info) that has been exploited in the recent years since, and since my accident & brush with death in '01, experiences throughout my life, some small (little significance)as well as or along with some bigger ones (profound, some very profound) slowly & a little at a time brought me to a conclusion that i saw something unknown to the majority of people & i feel determined and obligated to people to see and/or know /understand what is & has been going on for a very very long time. most think i'm crazy or something which i completely understand 110% but why people can't or don't see what is and has been happening is literally & seriously making me feel like i might lose control or my composure or something maybe. please believe & understand me (or not) i am very sure of what i've seen, know & stated but extremely confused yet i know something very few in this entire world could even begin to wrap their mind around, i know  critical & crucial information or secrets that have been deliberately suppressed or withheld from the mass population yet it's in our face everyday (i feel anyway). if i get a response i only hope that you are a very understanding, patient, compassionate, etc type of "real" person, if not i guess i am about to live "v the final battle" scenario which i never seen btw but have an understanding of what it's about. i have seen "things" with friends that seen with me (we followed with a telescope), a few years back as well as a couple others that have been completely diluted and/or plain ignorant & they didn't, couldn't or wouldn't allow themselves to see or believe what i was trying to show them & kept finding "logical" explanations. i need to know some truth, i know i'm not crazy! believe, listen, help me or not, i sort of don't care anymore but i have to figure this out and keep anyone and/or everyone i can safe by knowing the truth.
bryan
content.summary: I'm 38 confused with a severe tbi but also profound mixed up memories before & after that experience
